basics.label: Frontend Developer
basics.summary: Hello and welcome to my corner! I make softwares. I've written thousands of lines of clean, quality codes, implemented dozens of designs in figma and zeplin into HTML/CSS/jQuery and React most of which have been deployed to production with thousands of users such as the intelligent e-mail assistant - Lavender. I love coding because it gives me freedom. Freedom to create, live and work from anywhere on Earth. Whenever I'm not coding, I'm reading a thriller or writing a screenplay.
